title: Ancient Archaeology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/28/20
itunes:title: Ancient Archaeology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/28/20
description:
George Noory and Dr. Ken Hanson explore his work looking for ancient chambers that could hold the famed Ark of the Covenant somewhere underground in Jerusalem.
